title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at St. Joseph's Health (Orange, CA) in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: Simple interview process with basic questions about their missions and value statements. The interview was virtual and they guide you through the process. It was very present compared to other interviews
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for Joseph’s hospital?

title: Pharmacist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at St. Joseph's Health in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: Submitted application, interviewed with the pharmacy manager and operations manager. They let me know of their decision pretty quickly after the interview & were very clear on what their goals are for me.
Interview Questions: What areas of pharmacy am I interested in?

title: Graduate Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at St. Joseph's Health
Interview Descriptions: Interview was quick and to the point. The process was easy and I heard back quickly. Everyone was helpful with questions. It took about two days before I heard back
Interview Questions: Why do you want to be a nurse

title: Certified Central Sterile Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at St. Joseph's Health
Interview Descriptions: Basically, I was shown the department and because I was Certified I was offered the position. The manager walked me through the process of how the department operated. I had to wait for the next orientation date before I could start.
Interview Questions: What shift I wanted to work. 1st or 3rd.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at St. Joseph's Health (Syracuse, NY) in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions: I went to an RN job fair held at St. Josephs.  I talked to each of the stations for the units that were hiring.  It was down to telemetry and cardiac ICU.  Both managers were nice. Towards the end of the process the nurse recruiter asked me which one I liked more - I said I liked both.  She recommended the telemetry, and I said okay.  The next day I got an offer.
Interview Questions: how have you delt with a conflict with an employee

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at St. Joseph's Health (Phoenix, AZ) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: 3 interview comprised of lengthy panels. There were five people on the panel. They asked multiple questions related to strengths and weaknesses. In addition, they value skills and specialties pertaining to certain departments which are applied for.

title: Clinical Engineering Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at St. Joseph's Health (Syracuse, NY) in Oct 2015
Interview Descriptions: very thorough, met with multiple manager within the department was 4 hours long one day. Facility was very interested in prior background. included a tour of the work area and met with employees for each work area. Conversation was very candid and open.

title: Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Joseph's Health (Syracuse, NY)
Interview Descriptions: There was no interview for my position. The hiring process included an orientation in a classroom, followed by 6 days of orienting with co workers. I was then paired up with either an LPN or another nursing assistant for the first three months of my employment in order to become comfortable with the position. I felt that the orientation process was adequate.

title: Computer Operator Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at St. Joseph's Health (Syracuse, NY) in Oct 2013
Interview Descriptions: Was called by HR and the interview was scheduled, I met with the Manager and a Software Programmer.  I was notified that I received the job several days later.
Interview Questions: Experience, what shifts I was willing to work.

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at St. Joseph's Health (Syracuse, NY) in Feb 2012
Interview Descriptions: Hiring Process is very long a month of two. you may forget that you applied here
